name: Sheep Storm
description:
Objective

Protect your Sheeps from the Dinos!

A sheep in the darkness will end up eaten.

Repair the connected generator if the lightning broke a light.

Controls

Join in main menu - Enter/ A
Leave in main menu - Space / B

Move - WASD / Left Stick
Camera - Mouse / Right Stick
Interaction - Space / Left Mouse Button / A
